short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A suite of tools for medicinal chemistry and pharmacokinetics calculations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Name, Same Tool! (And more....)

Aiming to bring together tools for drug discovery scientists into one place. 

About:
I'm a medicinal chemist just learning to code and looking to make a tool that would be of use to a very niche section of the world.

Changelog:
New colour update (last one for a while I promise!)
Added Ketcher chemical structure drawing for those who want an open access drawer.
New fullscreen switching to open and keep the tool in a new tab

Please let me know of any bugs, and any new feature requests!

Ketcher Information: https://lifescience.opensource.epam.com/ketcher
